trends: There have been no other sightings in Cape Vincent
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi had stayed up late christmas eve 1992 sewing christmas stockings for neices. my spouse was in bed, no electronic equipment in home was on, just my sewing machine and light in hall w\my machine where i was sewing. i went to kitchen for a glass of water and saw a huge glowing light in farm field directly across the street in front of house. light was glowing w\what appreared to almost be objects? or movements within light. i went into bdrm to wake my husband to look out bdrm window. he awoke and remembers seeing the lights but could not stay awake. i was aggravated as he always has been interested in the unknown, but could not stay awake. i went back into kitchen to continue looking out window, only to see a entity that appeared to have a masculine type human form, very tall, 7-8 ft tall. the only way i can describe it is as if it was a form surrounded by a neon light. entity was standing by light pole directly across from the end of my driveway. it was so clear, i then became frightened, because it was so close, i did not know what it was and thought if i can see it, maybe it can see me. i was so scared i ran and got into bed w\my husband and just prayed for god not to let whatever it was to not bother us. i fell asleep so i cannot say how? or when? light and\or entity left. to this day i do not know what i saw, but i will never forget it.
Summary: Huge glowing ball of white light observed, additionally seemed to be activity going on in light. Observed what seemed to be a human type masculine form at least 7-8 ft tall at light pole directly across from my driveway.
